com.tinfoilsms.crypto

Class ECKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinfoilsms.crypto.ECKey

  • public class ECKey
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class that simplifies the creation of a private/public Elliptic Curve keypair. This class should be used to generate the initial private/public keypair for the user.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
